meanings.definition: Not providing an explanation or reason.
meanings.sent1: The nonexplanatory answer left me confused.
meanings.sent2: Her nonexplanatory response only added to the mystery.
meanings.sent3: The nonexplanatory magic trick amazed the audience.
meanings.sent4: The nonexplanatory fog enveloped the entire town.
meanings.sent5: The nonexplanatory painting left everyone puzzled.

meanings.definition: Failing to clarify or make clear.
meanings.sent1: The nonexplanatory instructions were hard to follow.
meanings.sent2: His nonexplanatory speech only caused more confusion.
meanings.sent3: The nonexplanatory map led us in circles.
meanings.sent4: The nonexplanatory puzzle of life seemed unsolvable.
meanings.sent5: The nonexplanatory movie plot left viewers scratching their heads.
